DESCRIPTION: Will be played without any cost when drawn. Draw a card upon being played.
#yFunnel attacks at the start of each of your turn. NL For each Energy cost this turn, you may switch #yFunnel.
Sum of the upgrades of #yDimension #ySplitter: #yAria and the three #yFunnels.
You are rewarded upon completing tasks during combat.
#yPursuing #yFunnel deals damage to #yPursued enemies at the start of the their turn.
Bleeding creatures take additional damage equal to #yBleeding from Attacks this turn. NL It halves at the end of turn.
Whenever you end combat with #b10 or more #yHyperdimensional #yLink, a random card is upgraded.
Trigger the passive ability of your #yFunnel.
